title: Anomaly Transactions
description: Feed unstructured data and in minutes, get details of all the anomaly transactions from the ledger.

title: Business Analysis
description: Gain valuable insights on business. Get projections, analyse performance, annual statements.

title: Taxation Analysis
description: Analyse company's tax and get insights on misses and regularities.

title: Task Management
description: Efficiently manage tasks and projects with Foxi's intuitive task management tools. Assign, track progress, and collaborate seamlessly.

title: Notice Reconciliation
description: Reconcile and look for all the notices in one place. You do not have to visit multiple portals to track notices or miss them.

title: Notice Deadlines
description: Have notices that have deadlines, get intelligent notifications automatically so you do not have to remember them and miss the dates.

title: Tax Planning // Trial Balance
description: Do not have a hard time planning the advance tax. Upload your trial balance and get the tax details in seconds.

title: Third-Party Apps
description: Connect Foxi with your favorite tools and apps effortlessly. Streamline workflows and enhance productivity with seamless integrations.

title: Mobile Accessibility
description: Stay productive on the go with Foxi's mobile app. Access key features, collaborate with your team, and manage tasks anytime, anywhere.

title: Dedicated Customer Support
description: Receive exceptional customer support whenever you need it. Our dedicated team is here 24/7 to assist you with any questions or issues.

title: Robust Data Security
description: Rest assured knowing your data is safe with Foxi's robust security measures. We employ industry-standard protocols to protect your information.

title: Scalability
description: Grow your business with confidence using Foxi's scalable platform. Whether you're a startup or a large enterprise, our solution adapts to your needs.
